Harpy.name: ratgirl
Harpy.description: A naked three foot high demi alien of a wild and feral bent. Some 4 feet of furless tail protrudes from above her ass and atop her head round furred radar like ears perch. She eyes you with a mischevious and hungry look, her slender little body clearly having subsisted on scavenging perhaps she hopes for a more filling meal.

missText.text: The rat fails to hit TARGET

hitText.text: The ratgirl smacks TARGET for VALUE damage
